title: Someday, Love to His Majesty - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Cold Love Interests   Different Social Status   Female Protagonist   Imperial Harem   Language Barrier   Nobles   R-15   Slow Romance   Transported to Another World
author: Ryo Asano   朝野りょう
description: When I tripped into another world, it was a world where there was no black hair. As a rare find, I have been presented to the rear palace as a tribute to the king of a neighboring country. A fast-paced woman tries to survive in the back palace in a world where she doesn’t know the language. It’s a story that moves all at its own pace.>
